name: Rescue Eva
description:
This game is about a funky dancing robot. He is on a journey to find out where his "girlfriend" is. He comes across lots of trouble as he tries to break through to reach his "girlfriend". Future progress on this game is unknown. We are not sure if we should continue working on this game or not.

The controls to the game are:

Up Arrow : Jump

Left Arrow : Move left

Right Arrow : Move right

Space Bar : Throw wrench (One direction only)

Enter : Start game:
